about:
I have a passion for beautiful user interfaces, performant applications and writing algorithms. My most common stack is React, TypeScript and Node.js, having also past experience with Vue.js, Flutter and Dart.

In my free time, I enjoy publishing applications and libraries of my own. I have written several articles on Medium focusing on best practices in React and Vue.js. and I have presented several workshops focused on React, hooks and context usage.

project.description:
- Working in a remote team made of engineers and designers
- Overseeing the scope delivery for various data visualizations
- Engineering and writing challenging algorithms for data visualizations
- Implementing render and performance improvements for smoother user interactions
- Participating in bug-fixing rotations

- Maintaing and implementing new features for the MoonPay Buy & Sell widget
- Working on an internal Storybook component library
- Driving unit testing and code coverage increase efforts in the codebase

- Leading the architecture and visual design of an internal application that provides insight into our products' various performance metrics.
- Implementing performance monitoring tools inside Microsoft Teams.

works.name: Accenture (Bratislava)
works.description: Developing and deploying services in a microservice structured enterprise project, using Apache Kafka for cross-service comunication.

project.description:
- A React + Node.js developer, UX/UI designer and front-end architect for a banking loan application interface.

- A Flutter/Dart developer for a reference mobile application for an Architecture workshop, working in a team of 2 - a side project.

- Designing and developing multiple UIs for data management in an event-driven application, using Apache Kafka and Reactive Interaction Gateway for real-time data processing. Leading front-end and coaching new joiners. Maintaining Node.js services.

- A front-end developer for a presentational pilot project, working with Vue.js to create customer-facing banking various UIs.

- Designing and developing a UI for software architects with focus on various nested data visualizations (d3) and CRUD operatios. Allows pptx export of d3 treemap calculated data.

works.name: Materna GmbH Information & Communications (Bratislava)
works.description: Development of reactive single-page multi-language applications (mostly in Vue.JS), focused on European market. Designing and coding the functionality of friendly and intuitive Graphical User Interfaces that provide pleasant experience.

project.description: Development of reactive single-page multi-language applications (mostly in Vue.JS), focused on European market. Designing and coding the functionality of friendly and intuitive Graphical User Interfaces that provide pleasant experience.

works.name: Freelance front-end developer & designer (Prague)
works.description:
Development of my own single-page social network (Vue.JS, PHP)
Development of my own e-shop (Vue.JS, PHP) 
Upgrading my work time tracking application (wixi.it) 
Designing and upgrading my personal website (danajanoskova.sk) into Vue.JS 
Working on small clients’ projects

project.description:
- Development of a new website CMS with the ability to build your websites in drag&drop style, with customizable grid following each bootstrap breakpoint (draggable column content widths on various devices), used to make both personal small sites and big e-shops. Coding the front-end for various clients’ websites.

- Working on my own side projects, public applications and development of an e-shop system integrated with PayPal, with an Admin interface.

- Creation of an application (interactive template based on the company's wireframe) for a site focused on public research and user feedback, UX/UI design.

works.name: TRIM Broker, a.s. (Bratislava)
works.description: Designing an application made in React focused on helping market traders. The app included daily news, calendars, charts and analysis - with likes and commenting system. The members could befriend one another, send personal messages, check the activity feed and filter the articles based on various parameters.

project.description: Designing and coding an application made in React focused on helping market traders. The app included daily news, calendars, charts and analysis - with likes and commenting system. The members could befriend one another, send personal messages, check the activity feed and filter the articles based on various parameters.

projects.name: blokep.netlify.app
projects.summary: An app that lets you create Blocks of HTML & CSS, nest them, extend them, reuse them, pass children inside and change your layout extremely fast with dragging your blocks around and leveraging the option to use your defined CSS color variables

projects.name: react-handbook.danajanoskova.sk
projects.summary:
An interactive code snippet guide to teach you how to use React in real world applications.
We start with basic knowledge and examples and get deeper into discovering hooks, routing, common use cases, component nesting, API calls - everything you could possibly encounter when coding an app of your own!

projects.name: playbanggame.online
projects.technologies: - Vue.js, JavaScript, Adonis.js (Node.js), MySQL, Websocket, Netlify, Heroku
projects.summary: A non-monetized internet version of the popular BANG! card game, which allows people from all around the world to play together on any device with internet connection.

projects.name: retro-tickets.herokuapp.com
projects.technologies: - Vue.js, Node.js, MySQL, Websocket, SCSS, Heroku
projects.summary: A feedback board with the option to toggle visibility of participants' comments that also contains planning poker, providing real-time feedback using websockets

projects.name: uvar.sk
projects.technologies: - Vue.JS (Vue CLI 3), JavaScript (ES6, ES7), Bootstrap, Laravel REST API (PHP), MySQL, SASS, design
projects.summary: Uvar.sk is a delicious place designed to to store all your favourite recipes and filter them based on the used ingredients. Create your own recipe collection with the option to add other users' recipes as your favourite. Collecting recipes has never been easier!

contributions.description: A small open-source app to make designing flex layouts faster.

workshops.description: The primary teacher in a 5-day long React fundamentals course, which was a part of a full-stack bootcamp.
